location: 28 Mont' Kiara - Mont' Kiara, Greater KL

showroom.address: UEM Sunrise Showcase 21, Jalan Kiara, Mont’Kiara, 50480 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
showroom.operating_hours: Weekdays: 9.30am to 5.30pm Weekends and Public Holidays: 10.00am to 5.00pm

description: MK28 received three prestigious awards in 2010: the International Residential Property Award for Best International High-Rise Development; and the Asia Pacific Residential Property Awards for Best High-Rise Development Asia Pacific and Best High-Rise Development Malaysia. 78 per cent of the 5.81-acre freehold land is dedicated to soft and hard landscaping. The entire development is influenced by natural shapes and feature organic, curved lines. Only six spacious and airy units are found on each floor in the two tower blocks, and even then, the lifts convey you up to a private lift lobby that leads into each home. The large units, starting from 2,535 sq. ft, and six penthouses, are suitable for families with children, who would find it convenient to live so near the international schools in Mont’Kiara.
features: Various Water Features And Facilities Promote Environmental Cooling And Ambience
50-metre Lap Pool With A Resistance Feature
Double-storey Clubhouse With A Rooftop Garden
